comment: Note: you should copy this file to your local conf/plugins, and delete all but Disabled and Config sections

Config.Second: Police let me in, it's cold out here!
Isabel working, or should I keep knocking?
Bless you!
Claire the way, I'm coming in!
Radio not, here I come!
Howard I know?
Cereal pleasure to meet you!
Alpaca the suitcase if you'll loada the car!
Wooden shoe love to hear another knock-knock joke?
Nana yer business, open up!
Harry up and let me in!
Adolph ball hit me in the mouf - dat why I talk dis way!
Omar goodness, wrong house!
Panther no panth, I’m going thwimming!
Oswald my bubble gum!
Olive you and I don't care who knows it!
No, car go "beep beep"
Goliath down, thou looketh tired
Wendy bell works again, I'll stop knocking
Figs your dang doorbell already!
Moustache you a question, but I’ll shave it for later!
Ah, forget it - it's pointless
You're welcome!
Al give you a kiss if you'll open the door!
Weevil weevil rock you
Frank you for being my friend!
Dishes a nice place ya got here
